price: Und Wir schenkten ihm aus Unserer Barmherzigkeit seinen Bruder Harun als Propheten.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحۡمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ نَبِيّٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu min raḥmatinā akhāhu hārūna nabiyyan
